ðŸ“– Summary: Librum is a C++ based application designed for reading and managing e-book libraries. It offers features such as note-taking, AI tooling, and highlighting, along with the ability to manage an online library accessible from any device. The application also provides free access to over 70,000 books and personal reading statistics.
